title: Exponent
text: To undo the square of the $$x$$ and solve, take the square root of both sides.

title: Square Root of Negative Number
text: To take the square root of a negative number, use the fact that $$i^2=-1$$

title: Separating out the Negative
text: Take the square root of $$-25$$ as $$-1\times25$$.

title: Positive and Negative
text: Remember that taking the square root always results in a positive and negative of the result because the squaring removes the negative.
